title: Bonus RP
body: I noticed that with these new skin sales being released as it said on the OCE post, it said that there will also be bonus RP for all the RP you buy between several days. When you click on the link to find out more it leads you to the NA post about the bonus RP and after recently searching the boards and news in OCE, I have come to the conclusion that OCE wont get bonus RP when buying RP at the start of December...Why?

replies.body:
BTW it's in the news section now.

Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-headed-your-way-limited-time

Either it's going to happen or it's not going to happen. If it's going to happen, it just means Riot have failed to inform OCE yet again. If it's not going to happen, it's because Riot doesn't care about OCE.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bgaRbJR5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T23:45:40.348+0000)
>
> Either it's going to happen or it's not going to happen. If it's going to happen, it just means Riot have failed to inform OCE yet again. If it's not going to happen, it's because Riot doesn't care about OCE.

I remember when you used to be more up beat =(

That was before all the sh!t that's happened in the last few month. First the OCE skin then they ruined Quinn (and probably the rest of the game as well), of course I'm not going to be as upbeat as I used to be.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bgaRbJR5,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-13T00:26:01.756+0000)
>
> That was before all the sh!t that's happened in the last few month. First the OCE skin then they ruined Quinn (and probably the rest of the game as well), of course I'm not going to be as upbeat as I used to be.

That's a shame =(
